scripts.start: npm run kill:offline && npm run start:offline && serverless invoke local -f main --path tests/resources/queue-event.json
scripts.build:copy: find src -type f \( -name "*.yml" -or -name "*.json" \) | cpio -pdm .build && find tests -type f \( -name "*.yml" -or -name "*.json" -or -name "*.base64" \)  | cpio -pdm .build
scripts.test: cross-env SQS_BUCKET=local AWS_REGION=local BRANCH=local AWS_XRAY_CONTEXT_MISSING=LOG_ERROR jest --testMatch="**/*.unitTest.ts" --coverage --collectCoverageFrom="src/!(models)/**/!(*conversion).{js,ts}"
scripts.test-i: cross-env SQS_BUCKET=local AWS_REGION=local USE_CONTAINERIZED_DATABASE=0 BRANCH=local jest --testMatch="**/*.intTest.ts" --runInBand --coverage --collectCoverageFrom="src/!(models)/**/*conversion.{js,ts}"
scripts.test-local-i: cross-env SQS_BUCKET=local AWS_REGION=local BRANCH=local USE_CONTAINERIZED_DATABASE=1 jest --testMatch="**/*.intTest.ts" --runInBand --coverage --collectCoverageFrom="src/!(models)/**/*conversion.{js,ts}"
scripts.prepush: npm test && npm run build && npm run test-local-i
scripts.coverage: cross-env SQS_BUCKET=local AWS_REGION=local BRANCH=local SLS_DEBUG=* jest --testMatch="**/*.*Test.ts" --coverage --collectCoverageFrom="src/!(models)/**/!(*conversion).{js,ts}"
scripts.package: mkdir -p ${ZIP_NAME} && cp package.json package-lock.json ${ZIP_NAME}/ && cp -r .build/src/* ${ZIP_NAME}/ && cd ${ZIP_NAME} && npm ci --production && rm package.json package-lock.json && zip -qr ../${ZIP_NAME}.zip .
scripts.security-checks: git secrets --register-aws && git secrets --scan && git log -p | scanrepo

hooks.pre-commit: npm run security-checks && npm run audit && npm run lint && npm run prettier
